import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "react-responsive-carousel/lib/styles/carousel.min.css"; // requires a loader import { Carousel } from 'react-responsive-carousel'; import '../css/mystyle.css' export default function Arrview(props){ const[arrangament,setArrangament]=useState([]) useEffect(()=>{ fetch("http://localhost:8080/arrangement/view") .then(res=>res.json()) .then((result)=>{ setArrangament(result); }) },[]) return(

Naziv {arrangament.name}
{arrangament.remmark}Komentar
Tip prevoza:
{arrangament.transportation}Autobus
Cena po ocobi:
{arrangament.price}100â‚¬
); }
